Package io.papermc.paper.entity.damage.builder

Interface AbstractDamageOriginBuilder<T,B>

All Known Subinterfaces:
AbstractEntityDamageOriginBuilder<T,B>, BadRespawnPointDamageOriginBuilder, DamageOriginBuilder, EntityDamageOriginBuilder, IndirectEntityDamageOriginBuilder
public interface AbstractDamageOriginBuilder<T,B>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    B
    build()
    Transform this prototype builder into a real damage origin applicable to any entity.
